data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: petrol, diesel, pump. However, the story should not be about going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: Once upon a time, Petrol, Diesel, and Pump were three best friends living in the bustling city of Autoville. Petrol was a lively and energetic character, always running around and making everyone laugh, while Diesel was more composed and steady, always keeping things grounded. Pump, on the other hand, was the heart of the group, always pumping life into their adventures and making sure they never ran out of fun. One day, Petrol and Diesel had a big argument about who was more important, each claiming that without them, Autoville would come to a standstill. Seeing his friends fight, Pump stepped in and reminded them that it wasn't about who was more important, but how they worked together to keep the city moving, just like how a car runs on both petrol and diesel.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: stamp, letter, send. However, the story should not be about putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: In the tiny village of Littleset, lived a little boy named Stamp, who was as unique as his name. His best friend was a magical talking bird named Letter, who had the power to send messages to the universe. One day, Stamp asked Letter to send a message to the stars, asking for a day of endless sunshine. Letter, fluttering her wings, sent the message into the universe, creating a spectacle of twinkling lights in the night sky. To their delight, the next day, the sun shone brightly, giving Stamp and Letter the most joyous day of endless sunshine.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: organ, empire, comply. However, the story should not be about having an organ empire and complying with regulations. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: In the quiet town of Ogdenville, lived a young boy named Peter who had a unique talent for playing the organ. His music had a magical charm that could make even the hardest of hearts comply to its melody. One day, a traveling merchant heard his music and was so mesmerized that he invited Peter to the grand city of the empire. Peter, with his organ on his back, set off on an adventure to the city, dreaming of playing his music to the world. Little did he know, his humble tunes were about to become the anthem of the empire.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: gloom, payment, exist. However, the story should not be about the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: In a far-off realm where shadows were a form of currency, there existed a curious little market. Traders of all kinds would gather, offering gloom from their hearts in exchange for wares. Payment was always a delicate affair, for the gloom was intangible and had to be carefully extracted. One day, a young boy who had no gloom to offer, asked if he could exist in this world without such a payment. The old trader smiled and replied, "My boy, in this world, even sunshine has its cost."
